title: Remove the “Start Gamepad Testing” CTA button from the SEO content block

requirements.text: Remove the visible call-to-action button labeled exactly “Start Gamepad Testing” from the marketing/SEO content block component (frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterSeoContentBlock.tsx), and remove any now-unused imports and functions that only existed to support this button (e.g., the scroll handler).
acceptanceCriteria: The “Start Gamepad Testing” button is no longer rendered anywhere in the marketing/SEO content block.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterSeoContentBlock.tsx no longer imports the shadcn Button component if it is not used after removal.
Any scroll-to-tester handler/function that is only used by the removed button is deleted and the file compiles without unused-variable/import warnings.

requirements.text: Update the “How to Use the Online Gamepad Tester” section text in frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterSeoContentBlock.tsx to remove the instruction that references clicking the removed “Start Gamepad Testing” button, while keeping all remaining marketing/SEO text intact and in English.
acceptanceCriteria: The ordered list item that says “Click the Start Gamepad Testing button on this page.” is removed or rewritten so it no longer references a non-existent button.
All other headings/paragraphs/lists in the SEO block remain present and readable in English.
There are no remaining user-facing references to “Start Gamepad Testing” in the SEO block after this change.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn UI components are read-only).
Keep the backend unchanged (single-actor Motoko canister; no new methods required).
nonGoals: Do not remove or change any other buttons or controls in the interactive tester panels (e.g., vibration controls, calibration sliders, latency test controls).
Do not change the tester page anchor element id="tester-interactive-area" in frontend/src/pages/TesterPage.tsx (it may still be used by other navigation behaviors in the future).
